name: bank-management-system-main
description: BANK MANAGEMENT SYSTEM, is a simple banking application for managing customers and employees in a bank. A PERN stack project with Node.js as back-end and React.js and Bootstrap as front-end.    Created a RESTful API in a Node.js environment running on a Express.js server using a PostgreSQL database. Also Includes PL/SQL concepts and DBMS querying.

scripts.start: concurrently "cd server && nodemon app.js" "cd client && npm start"

repository.install: cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
